text: Wilsthorpe Business and Enterprise College is a school for children in the town of Long Eaton in south east Derbyshire. The school is close to Nottinghamshire. The school delivers free education to local children when they are eleven until they leave school. Wilsthorpe was the first school in England to have a policeman on site in 2003.School gets own policeman, 14 April 2003 accessed 8 December 2007 In their 2013 report, Ofsted said that the school 'requires improvement'.http://www.wilsthorpe.derbyshire.sch.uk/Documents/ofsted.pdf ==References== Category:Schools in England
title: Wilsthorpe Community School
